DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate whether Cartiva is an effective treatment for individuals with osteoarthritis of the great toe.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of an Implant in the Treatment of Osteoarthritis of the Great Toe
